Overall good✨

text:
Hospitality ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 
Cleanliness ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Ambience ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Attentiveness ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

It is my second trip to this lovely city Banjarmasin (and also) my first time staying at the hotel under Zuri Hotels Management.

Yusuf handle me when I do check in process. Everything going well. How he treat guests are excellent. Well explained with honest pure smile on his face.

I'm not go straight to my room. I wanna stay for couple of minutes at their restaurant to enjoy the ambience. The vibes feels so lovely and welcome. 

Then Iman came, offering me with the menu's. Hey! All prices are soooo affordable! Believe me guys.

I'm not mood yet for take main dishes, it's too early for me, so I order a cup of coffee. Unfortunately, at that time, Zuri Express Banjarmasin still not have a coffee machine.

As a person who 'extremely' addicted to strong coffee, that's a little bit problem for me. But that's OK, who knows in the near future, they will have it. Anyway, Iman hospitality services is perfect.

How about the room? LAV it! I'm staying at 701. It's perfectly fit for me, not too small or too big. Everything are clean, neat and (VERY) comfy. The internet speed, air conditioner and water heater works VERY good. 

Next morning when I do breakfast, Ika greetings me. I like the way she's smile. Cheerful person, energic and so kind.

If you LOVE spicy, man YOU MUST come here! They have 20 kind different of sambals! That's crazy! In my head I'm screaming like, "Whaaaaat ... How AMAZING is thaaaaat 🤩🤩🤩".

Actually there are LOT of other things I want to share with you guy's, but I need to catch a flight.

Overall ... Zuri Express Banjarmasin is my TOP CHOICE when I come visit Banjarmasin again.

AMAZING works guy's!
Cheers 🍻🍻🍻
title: It's mind blowing! BEYOND my expectations
